tha-ap399:1.3: pitā matā bhātā → mātā pitā ca bhātā ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:13.2: saṁ tacaṁ → santavaṁ (bj); santanuṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); saṁ tanuṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:15.2: girimañjariṁ → girimañjarimapūjayiṁ (bj); girimañjari pūjayiṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); girapañjaliṁ pūjayiṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:15.3: Dibbagandhaṁ sampavantaṁ → dibbagandhena sampannaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap399:21.2: atulopi → atulo ca (bj); atulopi (sya1ed, sya2ed); mahāsamuddo vākkhobbho atulo pi (pts-vp-pli1)
